about_the_game:
About the Game
Queen Slayer is a turn-based combat RPG set in a dark and mysterious world. As a mercenary group on a quest to defeat a powerful queen, players will engage in battles against various enemies. The game combines strategic elements with unique character skills, allowing you to enjoy intense and challenging combat.

What You Can Expect in This Demo
Core Combat System: We’ve prepared several scenarios where you can directly experience combat. Each battle requires different strategic elements, and you’ll need to use skills that align with your enemies’ characteristics.
Characters and Skills: The demo features several key characters and their unique skills. The outcome of battles can vary depending on how you combine and utilize these skills. Stun or knock down your enemies to gain an advantage in combat.
Development Roadmap
Our team is currently working on additional characters and more in-depth content for the game. We will continue to refine the game based on the feedback received from this demo. Additionally, an upcoming update will introduce new battle scenarios and characters, so stay tuned for more exciting developments.

Community Feedback Request
Your feedback is invaluable to us. After playing the demo, please share any thoughts or suggestions you have about the gameplay. We’re committed to using your input to make Queen Slayer an even better game.
